Name: Gun Metal Blue cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
7.5 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (coin sized).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and float as garnish.
Review: Orange, peach and cinnamon delicately flavour this mezcal-based Margarita riff.
History: Created in February 2015 by Mike Shain and Nicholas Bennett at Porchlight in New York City. At Porchlight, the original is made with house-made cinnamon syrup infused with gentian root to add a slight bitterness, so you may want to add 2.5ml gentian liqueur to the above recipe.
Nutrition: One serving of Gun Metal Blue cocktail contains 173 calories
